links.title: Anthropic's Claude Model Spec: A Blueprint for AI Soul
links.summary: Anthropic releases the full specification document that guides Claude's behavior, values, and decision-making. A fascinating look into how AI companies are thinking about alignment and character.
links.notes: This is a must-read for anyone interested in AI alignment. The document reveals how Anthropic thinks about Claude's 'personality' and ethical guidelines.

links.title: The Future of Code Review is AI-Powered
links.summary: Cursor explores how AI is transforming code review processes, making them faster and more comprehensive while catching bugs humans might miss.
links.notes: Interesting perspective on AI code review. The examples of bugs caught by AI that humans missed are compelling.

links.title: Tailwind CSS v4.0: Faster, Smaller, Better
links.summary: The new version of Tailwind CSS brings significant performance improvements, a new engine, and exciting new features for modern web development.
links.notes: Finally upgraded to v4! The new engine is noticeably faster. Love the new color palette options.

links.title: GitHub Copilot: Your AI Pair Programmer
links.summary: GitHub Copilot uses AI to suggest code and entire functions in real-time, right from your editor. Trained on billions of lines of public code.
links.notes: Comparing this with Cursor and Cline. Each has different strengths - Copilot is great for autocomplete, Cursor for full file edits.

links.title: Astro 5.0: Content Layer, Server Islands & More
links.summary: Astro 5.0 introduces the Content Layer API for flexible content management, Server Islands for dynamic content, and significant performance improvements.
links.notes: This is what powers Vibe Decoder! The Content Layer API is perfect for managing shared links.

links.title: Learn Rust: The Memory-Safe Systems Language
links.summary: Comprehensive resources for learning Rust, from beginner tutorials to advanced concepts. Rust offers memory safety without garbage collection.
links.notes: Starting my Rust journey. The borrow checker is confusing at first but makes sense once you understand ownership.
